title: 06/11/2021 - HOUR 1 - Clippers-Jazz, Bucks-Nets, CFP
itunes:title: 06/11/2021 - HOUR 1 - Clippers-Jazz, Bucks-Nets, CFP
description:
Colin discusses the Clippers being down 0-2 to the Jazz

Despite their loss to the Bucks, the Nets will still win the series

It's time to pay players if the College Football Playoff is set to 12 teams


Guest: Jim Jackson

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
